metadata.title: CVE-2018-8799 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Readin function process_secondary_order() that results in a Denial of Service(segfault).

criterions.comment: rdesktop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
